description: Full CRM command console for CLAWD Command — 60+ endpoints covering customers, leads, deals, projects, tasks, boards, cards, invoices, communications, documents, templates, content assets (with source tracking and customer linking), signatures, meetings, automations, and more.

auth.body_sha256_rule: SHA-256 hex of request body; if body is empty, hash the empty string
auth.replay_protection: Requests older than 300 seconds are rejected
auth.nonce_rule: Each nonce is single-use within the 5-minute window

response_schema.data_or_error: object — `data` on success, `error` string on failure

actions.name: crm_state_get
actions.description: Full CRM snapshot — boards, customers, deals, projects, meetings, templates

actions.name: crm_customers_list
actions.description: List customers with optional ?status= and ?category= filters

actions.description: Delete a customer by id

actions.name: crm_lead_upsert
